author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Accept a minor difference in returned error value with copy test.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/copy_tests.py
(url_to_non_existent_url_path): Accept the lowest directory part as not
being found instead of forcing the RA layer to walk all the way up to the
root.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Fix svnsync tests #14: verify that unreadable content is not synced.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/update.c
(handle_stream): If we get a 404, return an error instead of doing nothing.
(svn_ra_serf__get_file): Give enough info to create error; check for error.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Fix authz_tests.py #3 and more: Gracefully handle XML parsing failures.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/util.c
(svn_ra_serf__handle_xml_parser): Handle case where there's an error with
parsing.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/property.c
(svn_ra_serf__propfind_context_t): Add pointer to XML parser stream.
(setup_propfind): Store XML parser.
(svn_ra_serf__wait_for_props): Check for XML parsing errors on return.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Fix authz_tests.py #5: "test authz for write operations"
"lock a file, target is readonly: should fail" sub-test:
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/locks.c
(lock_info_t): Add reason code to structure
(handle_lock): Store reason code; create error when we see a 403.
(svn_ra_serf__lock): Always check error codes.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Fix authz_tests.py #5: "test authz for write operations"
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/commit.c
(checkout_dir): Do not recursively checkout directories.
